name: Basic Necklace with Geometric Brass Pendant called 'Dreamatrix'
description: This is an adjustable black necklace with a geometric brass pendant. It can be worn as a short or as a long necklace. The thread is made of cotton.
This item is made to order. Your necklace will look simular to the one pictured. Yet every handmade creation is unique and can vary a little from another.
The pendant is designed by myself and it's called DREAMATRIX.
